sentence.Network_en: He said the issue was not a major irritant.

sentence.Network_en: It may be that the itching is caused by contact with irritant material.
sentence.Network_cn: 瘙痒可能是由于接触了刺激性的物质而引起的。

sentence.Network_en: The noise of traffic is a constant irritant to city dwellers.
sentence.Network_cn: 车辆的噪音对城市居民是永无止境的骚扰.

entry.tran: 令人生气的事;让人恼火的事
entry.def: If you describe something as an irritant, you mean that it keeps annoying you.

example.ex: He said the issue was not a major irritant.
example.tran: 他说那个问题不是什么大问题。

entry.tran: (令身体部位发痒或疼痛的)刺激物
entry.def: An irritant is a substance which causes a part of your body to itch or become sore.

example.tran: 很多杀虫剂都具有刺激性。

means.word_mean: 1. something that causes irritation and annoyance;

sentences.en: Moreover,senior citizen discount is a direct irritant in what some politicians and scholars see as a coming conflict beteeen generations
